description: Geometric and organic patterns for dashboard backgrounds

patterns.name: Circuit Board
patterns.css: radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, #00f5ff 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, #ff00f5 0%, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)

patterns.name: Hexagon Grid
patterns.css: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(30deg, transparent, transparent 10px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 10px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 20px)

patterns.name: Wave Pattern
patterns.css: linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 20px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 20px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 40px)

patterns.name: Diamond Grid
patterns.css: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8edea 0%, #fed6e3 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 15px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 15px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 30px)

patterns.name: Dot Matrix
patterns.css: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 20%, rgba(255,255,255,0.2) 2px, transparent 2px), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, rgba(255,255,255,0.2) 2px, transparent 2px), linear-gradient(135deg, #2c3e50 0%, #34495e 100%)

patterns.name: Triangular Mesh
patterns.css: linear-gradient(135deg, #348f50 0%, #56b4d3 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(60deg, transparent, transparent 25px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 25px, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 50px)

patterns.name: Crosshatch
patterns.css: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9a9e 0%, #fecfef 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 10px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 10px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 20px), repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent, transparent 10px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 10px, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 20px)
